Class-Druid 20 -- Female Versatile Human Druid: 20
Strength: +4 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +4 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +5 Charisma: +3
Background: Scout Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 19472/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Forest Passage: Moves normally over difficult terrain caused by plants or fungi
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 5; Class: 15; General: 6; Skill: 10 Selectable Feature Count: Druid (Order); Human (Heritage)

Choose 1 from any); Forager; Skill Trained (Survival; Choose 1 from any Terrain Lore) Human Features: Ancestry Feats; Attribute Boost (Choose 2 from any); Human Heritage; Versatile Human
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Animal: Has the Animal Companion feature
Druid Feats: 10 selections
Druidic Order: 1 selection
General Feats: 5 selections
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Leaf: Has the Leshy Familiar feature
Order Explorer (Animal): +1 Class Feat
Order Explorer (Leaf): +1 Class Feat
Order Explorer (Storm): +1 Class Feat
Order Explorer (Untamed): +1 Class Feat
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Storm: Has the Storm Born feature
Untamed: Has the Untamed Form feature
Versatile Human: +1 General Feat
Voice Of Nature: +1 Class Feat (Animal Empathy or Plant Empathy)
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by druidic order
Animal Companion: Has a young animal companion
Enhanced Familiar: Can select 4 familiar or master abilities each day
Incredible Companion: Animal Companion has a choice of nimble or savage characteristics
Leshy Familiar Secrets: Familiar gains Grasping Tendrils, Purify Air, or Verdant Burst feature each day
Leshy Familiar: Has a Tiny plant or fungus familiar
Mature Animal Companion: Animal Companion is a mature companion and may Stride or Strike without a command
Order Explorer (Animal): Can select animal order feats
Order Explorer (Leaf): Can select leaf order feats
Order Explorer (Storm): Can select storm order feats
Order Explorer (Untamed): Can select untamed order feats
Primal Howl: Companion can use 2 actions to inflict 1d6 HP sonic per 2 levels and frightened 1 in a 30' cone once per hr (save basic Fortitude also negates frightened; critical failure inflicts frightened 2)
Specialized Companion: Animal Companion has a choice of specialization
Timeless Nature: Does not age
Train Animal: Can use days of training and a successful Nature check to teach an animal to perform a trick
Verdant Metamorphosis: Has plant, not humanoid, trait
Perception: +29 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +28 (dexterity; expert) Games Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Religion: +5 (wisdom; untrained)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Guild Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Sailing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +28 (strength; expert) Intimidation: +25 (charisma; trained) Society: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Baking Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Magnimar Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Stabling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Crafting: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +27 (wisdom; trained) Stealth: +26 (dexterity; trained)
Deception: +3 (charisma; untrained) Mountain Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +31 (wisdom; master)
Desert Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +27 (wisdom; trained) Theater Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Diplomacy: +25 (charisma; trained) Occultism: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: +4 (dexterity; untrained)
Farming Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Orc Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Warfare Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Forest Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +3 (charisma; untrained)
Fortune-Telling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Plains Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Languages: Aklo; Common; Halfling; Petran; Pyric; Sakvroth
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Baking Lore): Skill Legendary (Baking Lore)
Additional Lore (Farming Lore): Skill Legendary (Farming Lore)
Additional Lore (Games Lore): Skill Legendary (Games Lore)
Animal: Skill Trained (Athletics)
Druid Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Choose 6 from any)
Duplicated Training: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Leaf: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Perception Expertise: Perception Expert
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Games Lore): Skill Trained (Games Lore)
Skill Training (Orc Lore): Skill Trained (Orc Lore)
Storm: Skill Trained (Acrobatics)
Untamed: Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Animal Empathy: Can speak with animals
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Experienced Tracker: Can Track at full Speed
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes/Subsist successes provide for self and 16 others, or twice that number with a critical success
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Natural Medicine: Can use Nature to Treat Wounds; gives a +2 bonus in wilderness
Plant Empathy: Can communicate with plants and fungi
Quick Squeeze: Can Squeeze 5' per rd, or 10' per rd on a critical success
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Balance does not inflict off-balance/Can use Acrobatics to Grab An Edge
Storm Born: Suffers no Perception penalties from weather
Survey Wildlife: Can use Survival to Recall Knowledge about local creatures after 10 min of study
Terrain Expertise (Desert): +1 Survival in Desert
Terrain Expertise (Forest): +1 Survival in Forest
Wildsong: Knows a druid-specific language
Combat
Hit Points: 268 Armor Class: 39 (dexterity (2 max); expert) Class DC: Druid: 37 (wisdom; trained)
Armor: Hide Shield: None Weapons: Gauntlet (+28 1d4+4 B; strength; expert); Hand Crossbow (+28 1d6 P R60'; dexterity; expert); Spear (+28 1d6+4 P R20'; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Toughness: +20 Hit Points
Unconventional Weaponry (Scimitar): Weapon Familiarity (Scimitar)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Deimatic Display: (1) Makes a Demoralize attempt against animals, fungi, and plants in a 15' cone, with no penalty for lacking a shared language
Incredible Improvisation: (F) Gives +4 on an untrained skill check once per day
Pristine Weapon: Verdant weapon counts as cold iron and silver, inflicting +1d6 HP persistent bleed to creatures with weakness to either on a critical hit
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Side By Side: Self and companion automatically flank a foe adjacent to both
Storm Retribution: (R) Tempest Surge cast in response to a foe critical melee hit pushes the foe 5' (save Reflex negates; critical failure pushes 10')
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +31 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Fortitude Expertise: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Wild Willpower: Save Master (Will)
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Poison Resistance: Has poison resistance 10 and +1 saves vs. poison
Primal Aegis: Self and allies within 30' have resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, vitality, and void damage
Stubborn Persistence: Successful DC 17 flat check negates becoming fatigued
Timeless Nature: +2 vs. disease and primal magic
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Wandering Oasis: Self and allies within 60' are protected from severe environmental heat and cold
Wild Willpower: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: P10: 2; P1: 3; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 3; P5: 3; P6: 3; P7: 3; P8: 3; P9: 3; PC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Primal: +33 (wisdom; legendary) Spell DC: Primal: 43 (wisdom; legendary)
Spells:
Cornucopia (P1 Foc): (2) Eating the touched piece of produce within 10 min restores 1d6+4 HP; 6 pieces also count as a full meal (heightened +1 affects +1 piece)
Heal Animal (P1 Foc): (1) Touched animal (2 actions gives R30') regains 1d8 HP, or 1d8+8 HP with 2 actions (heightened +1 restores +1d8 HP or +1d8+8 HP)
Illusory Disguise (P1): (2) R30' Makes the target appear different and gives +4 Deception, plus the target level if untrained, to avoid uncovering the disguise for 1 hr (heightened 3rd allows copying a specific individual; 4th affects 10 targets; 7th affects 10 targets and allows copying specific individuals)
Illusory Object (P1): (2) R500' Creates an image of a stationary object in a 20' burst for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects include sounds and smells and last for 1 hr; 5th effects are permanent)
Illusory Scene (P5): (10 min) R500' Creates in a 30' burst a moving illusion with up to 10 creatures or objects, sounds, and smells for 1 hr (heightened 6th creatures in the scene can speak; 8th effects are permanent)
Impaling Briars (P8 Foc): (3) 100' emanation inflicts difficult terrain, -10 Speed (save Reflex negates; critical failure inflicts immobilized for 1 rd), or greater difficult terrain, plus 10d6 HP piercing and -10' Speed on a target with a successful spell attack (or immobilized with a critical success), each rd while sustained for up to 1 min
Nature Incarnate (P10): (2) Self becomes a Medium green man or Gargantuan kaiju with 30 temporary HP, Armor Class 45, +34 attack, darkvision, +36 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific attacks for 1 min
Oaken Resilience (P2): (2) Touched gains resistance 2 to bludgeoning and piercing and weakness 3 to fire for 10 min or until dismissed by target (heightened +2 gives +2 resistances and +3 weakness)
Primal Summons (P6 Foc): (F) Subsequent Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus gives summoned creature one of: a 60' fly Speed; a 20' burrow Speed, -10' Speed, and resistance 5 to physical damage; +1d6 HP fire damage, resistance 10 to fire, and weakness 5 to cold and water; a 60' swim Speed, a Shove after a melee attack, and resistance 5 to fire; +1d6 HP electricity damage and resistance 5 to electricity; a 30' climb Speed and resistance 2 to bludgeoning and piercing
Storm Lord (P9 Foc): (2) 100' emanation produces a bolt of lighting that inflicts 10d6 HP electricity and deafened for 1 rd (save basic Reflex) each rd while sustained for up to 1 min, plus a choice of weather: calm; foggy (conceals); rainy (inflicts -2 Acrobatics and Perception); or windy (inflicts -4 ranged attacks and difficult terrain for flying)
Stormwind Flight (P4 Foc): (2) Self gains 25' fly Speed for 1 min (heightened 6th negates difficult terrain effects when flying against the wind)
Tempest Surge (P1 Foc): (2) R30' Inflicts 1d12 HP electricity, clumsy 2 for 1 rd, and 1 HP persistent electricity (save basic Reflex inflicts initial HP only) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP initial and +1 HP persistent)
Untamed Form (P1 Foc): (2) Transforms self into a Pest Form creature for 10 min or another creature for 1 min, gaining +2 attacks (heightened 2nd may transform into an Animal Form creature)
Untamed Shift (P1 Foc): (1) Self gains claws that inflict 1d6 HP slashing, jaws that inflict 1d8 HP piercing, resistance 5 to critical hits and precision damage, 10' reach, or a 30' fly Speed for 1 min (heightened 6th may choose 2 effects, claws also inflict 2d6 HP persistent bleed damage, and jaws also inflict 2d6 HP persistent poison damage; 10th may choose 3 effects, claws also inflict 4d6 persistent bleed damage and jaws also inflict 4d6 HP persistent poison damage)
Magic Notes:
Animal: Knows the Heal Animal primal spell
Druidic Order: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Primal)
Fey Caller: Knows the Illusory Disguise, Illusory Object, and Illusory Scene primal spells
Grown Of Oak: Knows the Oaken Resilience primal spell; can cast it up to rank 8 at will on self and on leshy familiar within 30'
Hierophant's Power: +1 10th rank spell slot
Impaling Briars: Knows the Impaling Briars primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Invoke Disaster: Knows the Storm Lord primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Leaf: Knows the Cornucopia primal spell
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Primal)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Primal)
Order Magic (Animal): Knows the Heal Animal primal spell
Order Magic (Leaf): Knows the Cornucopia primal spell
Order Magic (Storm): Knows the Tempest Surge primal spell
Order Magic (Untamed): Knows the Untamed Shift primal spell
Primal Hierophant: Has 1 10th-rank spell slot
Primal Summons: Knows the Primal Summons primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Storm: Knows the Tempest Surge primal spell
True Shapeshifter: Knows the Nature Incarnate primal spell; can use it to become a kaiju or green man once per day
Untamed Form: Knows the Untamed Form primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Untamed: Knows the Untamed Shift primal spell
Wind Caller: Knows the Stormwind Flight primal spell/+1 Focus Points
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a second tradition
Anthropomorphic Shape: Can use Untamed Form to change into a Small or Medium humanoid
Call Of The Wild: Can spend 10 min in concert with nature to replace a prepared spell with Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus of the same rank
Current Spell: (1) Subsequent air or water spell gives self +1 Armor Class (+2 vs. ranged attacks) and +1 saves vs. air and water until the start of the next turn
Dragon Shape: Can use Untamed Form to change into a Large dragon, and Untamed Form gives resistance 5 to a choice of acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison
Druid Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the primal tradition
Effortless Concentration: (F) Sustains an active spell
Elemental Shape: Can use Untamed Form to change into a Medium elemental, and Untamed Form gives resistance 5 to fire
Elemental Summons: Can spend 10 min in concert with nature to replace a prepared spell with Summon Elemental of the same rank
Ferocious Shape: Can use Untamed Form to change into a Large dinosaur, and Untamed Form Athletics bonus increases by 1
Floral Restoration: (1) Draws on 15' sq of plant life to regain 10d8 HP and 1 Focus Point once per day
Form Control: (1) Subsequent Untamed Form, cast 2 ranks lower, lasts for 1 hr
Garland Spell: (1) Subsequent fungus or plant spell grows plants in a 10' burst that inflict difficult terrain and 4d6 HP piercing or poison for 1 min
Healing Transformation: (1) Subsequent non-cantrip polymorph spell restores 1d6 Hit Poins per spell rank
Insect Shape: Can use Untamed Form to change into a Medium insect; flightless forms last 24 hr
Instinctive Support: (F) Casting a non-cantrip spell on companion allows it to Support and take its actions
Ley Line Conduit: (1) Subsequent casting of an instantaneous spell of 5th rank or lower does not expend a spell slot once per min
Monstrosity Shape: Can use Untamed Form to change into a phoenix, purple worm, or sea serpent
Overwhelming Energy: (1) Subsequent spell ignores resistance 20 to energy
Perfect Form Control: Can retain Form Control shape permanently
Plant Shape: Can use Untamed Form to change into a Large plant, and Untamed Form gives resistance 5 to poison
Primal Focus: Refocus restores all Focus Points
Raise Menhir: (2) R30' 15' radius gives creatures +2 saves vs. a choice of arcane, divine, or occult effects while sustained up to 1 min
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Reactive Transformation: (R) Casts Untamed Form to assume a form from Aerial Form, Dragon Form, Elemental Form, or Plant Form in response to falling, energy damage, fire damage, or poison damage
Snowdrift Spell: (1) Subsequent air, water, or cold spell creates difficult terrain underneath 1 affected creature until the start of the next turn
Soaring Shape: Can use Untamed Form to change into a wasp, pterosaur, bat or bird, and Untamed Form Acrobatics bonus increases by 1
Sow Spell: (1) Prepares a subsequent 1- or 2-action spell to take effect in an adjacent square when a creature enters or is adjacent to it within 10 min; a successful Perception allows a creature to notice before triggering
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Storm Born: Suffers no ranged spell penalties from weather
Thunderclap Spell: (1) Subsequent instantaneous electricity spell also inflicts deafened for 1 rd (save Reflex negates; critical failure also knocks prone)
True Shapeshifter: (2) Changes shape during Untamed Form
Uplifting Winds: Casting an air or electricity spell while flying gives +10 fly Speed and an immediate 12' Fly action
Verdant Metamorphosis: Can use One With Plants effects at will; tree form raises Armor Class to 30, restores half Hit Points with 10 min in sunlight, and restores all Hit Points and removes all non-permanent conditions and poisons and diseases up to level 19 with daily rest
Verdant Weapon: 10 min process prepares a seed to grow into a weapon or shrink back into a seed with 1 action
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Notes
